001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.category;
003
004import static com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryTreeUtils.getCategoryOrThrow;
005import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
006import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toMap;
007
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.function.Function;
010import java.util.function.Predicate;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012
013import com.commercetools.api.models.Identifiable;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedStringEntry;
015
016/**
017 * Helper to create a Tree structure from a list of categories
018 */
019public class CategoryTreeFactory {
020    private CategoryTreeFactory() {
021    }
022
023    public static CategoryTreeFactory of() {
024        return new CategoryTreeFactory();
025    }
026
027    public CategoryTree create(final List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatList) {
028        final List<Category> roots = findRoots(allCategoriesAsFlatList);
029        return create(allCategoriesAsFlatList, roots, roots);
030    }
031
032    public CategoryTree create(final List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatList, final List<Category> roots,
033            final List<Category> subtreeRoots) {
034        final List<Category> allAsFlatList = allCategoriesAsFlatList;
035        final Map<LocalizedStringEntry, Category> categoriesByLocaleAndSlug = getLocalizedStringEntryCategoryMap(
036            allCategoriesAsFlatList);
037        final Map<String, Category> categoriesById = allCategoriesAsFlatList.stream()
038                .collect(toMap(Category::getId, Function.<Category> identity()));
039        final Map<String, Category> categoriesByKey = allCategoriesAsFlatList.stream()
040                .filter(category -> category.getKey() != null)
041                .collect(toMap(Category::getKey, Function.<Category> identity()));
042        final Map<String, List<Category>> childrenByParentId = getChildrenByParentIdMap(allCategoriesAsFlatList);
043        return new CategoryTreeImpl(roots, allAsFlatList, categoriesByLocaleAndSlug, categoriesById, categoriesByKey,
044            childrenByParentId, subtreeRoots);
045    }
046
047    private Map<String, List<Category>> getChildrenByParentIdMap(final List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatList) {
048        final Map<String, List<Category>> childrenByParentId = new HashMap<>();
049        allCategoriesAsFlatList
050                .forEach(category -> Optional.ofNullable(category.getParent()).ifPresent(parentReference -> {
051                    final String parentId = parentReference.getId();
052                    final List<Category> entries = childrenByParentId.getOrDefault(parentId, new LinkedList<>());
053                    entries.add(category);
054                    childrenByParentId.put(parentId, entries);
055                }));
056        return childrenByParentId;
057    }
058
059    private Map<LocalizedStringEntry, Category> getLocalizedStringEntryCategoryMap(
060            final List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatList) {
061        final Map<LocalizedStringEntry, Category> categoriesByLocaleAndSlug = new HashMap<>();
062        allCategoriesAsFlatList.forEach(category -> {
063            final Set<Locale> localesForTheCategory = category.getSlug()
064                    .values()
065                    .keySet()
066                    .stream()
067                    .map(Locale::new)
068                    .collect(Collectors.toSet());
069            localesForTheCategory.forEach(locale -> {
070                final LocalizedStringEntry stringsEntry = LocalizedStringEntry.of(locale,
071                    category.getSlug().values().get(locale));
072                categoriesByLocaleAndSlug.put(stringsEntry, category);
073            });
074        });
075        return categoriesByLocaleAndSlug;
076    }
077
078    private List<Category> findRoots(final List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatList) {
079        final Predicate<Category> isRootCategory = c -> c.getParent() == null;
080        return allCategoriesAsFlatList.parallelStream().filter(isRootCategory).collect(toList());
081    }
082
083    private List<Category> getSubtreeAsFlatList(final CategoryTree categoryTree,
084            final Collection<? extends Identifiable<Category>> parentCategories) {
085        final List<Category> categories = new ArrayList<>();
086        parentCategories.forEach(parent -> {
087            categories.add(getCategoryOrThrow(parent, categoryTree));
088            final List<Category> children = categoryTree.findChildren(parent);
089            categories.addAll(getSubtreeAsFlatList(categoryTree, children));
090        });
091        return categories;
092    }
093
094    public CategoryTree createSubtree(final CategoryTree categoryTree,
095            final Collection<? extends Identifiable<Category>> subtreeRoots) {
096        final List<Category> subtreeRootsCategories = subtreeRoots.stream()
097                .map(identifiable -> getCategoryOrThrow(identifiable, categoryTree))
098                .collect(toList());
099
100        final List<String> subtreeRootIds = subtreeRoots.parallelStream().map(Identifiable::getId).collect(toList());
101
102        subtreeRootsCategories.forEach(subtreeRoot -> {
103            final Optional<String> rootAncestorOptional = subtreeRoot.getAncestors()
104                    .stream()
105                    .map(x -> x.getId())
106                    .filter(ancestorId -> subtreeRootIds.contains(ancestorId))
107                    .findFirst();
108            if (rootAncestorOptional.isPresent()) {
109                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
110                    String.format("category of ID [%s] cannot be subtree root and descendant of [%s]",
111                        subtreeRoot.getId(), rootAncestorOptional.get()));
112            }
113        });
114
115        final List<Category> includedCategories = new LinkedList<>();
116        subtreeRootsCategories.forEach(parentCategory -> {
117            includedCategories.add(parentCategory);
118            final List<Category> children = categoryTree.findChildren(parentCategory);
119            includedCategories.addAll(getSubtreeAsFlatList(categoryTree, children));
120        });
121        final List<Category> roots = findRoots(includedCategories);
122        return create(includedCategories, roots, subtreeRootsCategories);
123    }
124
125}
